item.description:
The Boston Demons Aussie Rules Footy Club are hosting an Aussie Day party this year.

Entry is FREE and its all about having a beer (or a few more), meeting a bunch of other Aussies in the area and showing off our love for our country!!

There will be Aussie music playing all day, Aussie sport on the tv's, Aussie giveaways, Aussie trivia competition and a raffle for a smashin' Aussie hamper and other mystery prizes.

Hope everyone can make it, this doesn't happen too often on a Saturday overseas so theres no excuse not to attend!
item.why: Aussie day rarely falls on a Saturday so theres no reason to not celebrate with a bunch of other like minded people.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Australia Day
